True Multi-Agent Workload Management

From deployment to optimization, the Pattern platform ensures every model, agent, and tool runs exactly where it should ‚Äî with full control, visibility, and continuous improvement.

‚ö°Run the Right Model, on the Right Architecture, Every Time

Pattern intelligently deploys any model ‚Äî public, private, fine-tuned, or hybrid ‚Äî across your preferred infrastructure. Whether you're using APIs, containers, or fully self-hosted frameworks, the system ensures the model runs on the right architecture with appropriate memory, GPU, and isolation ‚Äî all configured in your pattern spec.

üîóBuilt for Real-World Stacks

üéØSmarter Resource Optimization

Pattern monitors all AI infrastructure ‚Äî from GPUs and TPUs to CPU-heavy inference nodes ‚Äî and continuously rebalances workloads to optimize cost, latency, and throughput. Idle pods are consolidated. Hot workloads are burst-scaled. No ops engineer required.

‚öñÔ∏èImpact-Based Autoscaling That Matches Business Demand

Pattern doesn‚Äôt scale just based on metrics like CPU or GPU usage. It scales based on results: customer wait times, completion quality, workflow latency, or job throughput. Each spec can define the conditions that matter most ‚Äî and Pattern handles the rest.

üîçControl center for your AI workforce.

ü§ñContinuous operational intelligence, built in.
